              [", and fails if no version greater than or equal to "],
              ["3.14", [["c"]]],
              [" is compatible. The operator "],
              ["\\>", [["c"]]],
              [" can also be used."]
            ]
          },
          "space_id": "cf9fa7dd-b245-42a0-b929-d5a276b3afe0",
          "type": "bulleted_list",
          "version": 1
        }
      },

                ": You might want to use one of the Ruby version management libraries like "

              [" or "],
              ["rvm", [["a", "https://github.com/rvm/rvm"]]],
